description: Erin Taylor's summer internship just got a lot hotter as she discovers her bosses kinky machines. She locks the door, and decides to have a little fun in private - or so she thinks. The room is rigged with surveillance cams and Erin's secret session becomes not so sneaky after all as her boss videotapes her naked and fucking in his office. Erin has a couple solid orgasms on the Love Seat and with Pandora's box but the SatisfyHer wins her over as she cums standing up and again spread out on the couch.
title: Summer intern - Erin Taylor
